Distribution in Russia
(
Fig. 2
a). Leningradskaya Prov., Yaroslavskaya Prov., Moscow Prov., Ryazan Prov., Belgorod Prov., Tatarstan Republic, Udmurtia Republic, Rostov Prov., Volgograd Prov., Bashkortostan Republic, *Orenburg Prov., *Sverdlovskaya Prov., Astrakhan Prov., Kirov Prov., Siberia.

General distribution . Great Britain , Spain , Norway , Sweden , Netherlands , Belgium , Luxemburg , France , Denmark , Germany , Switzerland , Austria , Finland , Poland , Czech Republic , Slovakia , Hungary , Italy , Slovenia , Croatia , Serbia , Bulgaria , Romania , Greece , Ukraine , Russia , Turkey , Georgia .
